com.microblink.camera.hardware.camera.camera1.frame

Class Camera1AbstractFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microblink.camera.hardware.camera.camera1.frame.Camera1AbstractFrame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICameraFrame, PoolObject
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Camera1PhotoFrame, Camera1PreviewFrame

    public abstract class Camera1AbstractFrame
extends java.lang.Object
implements ICameraFrame
    Created by dodo on 28/07/15.
